query.createAnalysisPost: insert analysis_post ( analysis_post_cre_date, title, contents_hash, writer_addr, is_voting_yn, stock_code, file_hashs, vote_exp_date, app_id, analysis_type, preview_text, cre_datetime, type) values (?)
query.selectAnalysisPostList: select ap.analysis_post_no, ap.analysis_post_cre_date, ap.title, ap.contents_hash, ap.writer_addr, ap.is_voting_yn, ap.stock_code, ap.file_hashs, ap.vote_exp_date, ap.app_id, ap.analysis_type, ap.preview_text, ap.type, date_format(ap.cre_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') cre_datetime, date_format(ap.upd_datetime, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i') upd_datetime, ui.user_name, ui.user_profile_hash from analysis_post ap inner join user_info ui on ap.writer_addr = ui.user_addr
query.selectMaxAnalysisPostNo: select max(ap.analysis_post_no) analysis_post_no from analysis_post ap
query.conditionStockNameCodeTitleUserName: inner join stock_info si on ap.stock_code = si.stock_code where si.stock_name like ? or ap.title like ? or ap.stock_code like ? or ui.user_name like ?
query.orderByVotingExpDateDesc: order by ap.is_voting_yn desc, ap.vote_exp_date desc, ap.stock_code
query.updateAnalysisPost: update analysis_post set contents_hash = ?, file_hashs = ?, preview_text = ?, upd_datetime = ? where analysis_post_no = ?
query.changeAnalysisPostInfo: update analysis_post set is_voting_yn = 'n' where vote_exp_date = ?
